howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.processDescription: A transparent 4-step journey — from cattle waste to clean energy.
howItWorks.empoweringFarmers: Empowering every farmer to become a clean energy partner.

step1.title: Smart Collection
step1.subtitle: कचरे से कमाई — डिजिटल तरीके से।
step1.description: The journey begins at the farm, where Saubhagya's GauSakhi App and IoT-based weighing scales record each collection with accuracy and trust.
step1.shortDescription: Smart collection of cattle dung through IoT weighing scales and GauSakhi app.
step1.details: Every kilogram of cattle dung is digitally logged, verified, and assigned a unique transaction ID — ensuring farmers are paid for every contribution.
highlights: Transparent weighing with smart IoT scales
step1.whyItMatters: No middlemen, no manual errors — just fair, measurable income for every farmer.

step2.title: Safe Transport
step2.subtitle: सुरक्षित ढुलाई — स्वच्छता और पारदर्शिता के साथ।
step2.description: Once collected, the cattle dung is carried in smart tractor-bogeys equipped with trap doors to prevent spillage.
step2.shortDescription: GPS-tracked safe transportation via BiogasSangh platform.
step2.details: The BiogasSangh platform tracks every vehicle through GPS and route optimization, ensuring on-time, clean, and efficient delivery to the biogas plant.
step2.whyItMatters: Efficiency on roads means faster payments, cleaner villages, and reduced transport costs.

step3.title: CBG Production
step3.subtitle: गुणवत्ता युक्त उत्पादन — तकनीक के भरोसे।
step3.description: At the biogas plant, the collected waste is transformed into Compressed Bio Gas (CBG) using advanced digesters.
step3.shortDescription: Biogas purification and conversion into Compressed Bio Gas (CBG).
step3.details: The ShuddhiDoot App continuously monitors methane content, purity, and quality benchmarks using IoT sensors and blockchain verification.
step3.whyItMatters: Every batch of CBG meets global clean fuel standards — ensuring reliability for buyers and rewards for producers.

step4.title: Fair Payment
step4.subtitle: तेज़ भुगतान — पारदर्शी और भरोसेमंद।
step4.description: After successful delivery and verification, the UrjaVyapar App automates payments directly to farmers' bank accounts — within 3 days.
step4.shortDescription: Instant, transparent digital payments to farmers within 3 days.
step4.details: This eliminates delays, manual paperwork, and uncertainty, creating a culture of financial transparency.
step4.whyItMatters: When farmers get paid faster, they invest faster — driving a self-sustaining rural economy.

consistentIncome.title: Consistent Daily Income
consistentIncome.subtitle: दैनिक आय
consistentIncome.description: Transform waste into reliable, year-round income stream
consistentIncome.details: Earn ₹3-5 per kilogram of cattle dung with flexible daily collection schedules that fit your routine. Unlike seasonal crops, this income source remains consistent throughout the year regardless of weather or harvest cycles. A farmer with 25 cattle producing 250kg of dung daily can earn ₹750-1,250 per day, translating to ₹22,500-37,500 monthly. No upfront investment required - start earning from day one. The material you previously had to dispose of now becomes a valuable commodity with guaranteed buyers.

incomeBoost.title: Significant Income Boost
incomeBoost.subtitle: बढ़ा हुआ मुनाफा
incomeBoost.details: Our transparent, market-linked pricing ensures you receive competitive rates with quality bonuses for superior materials. This additional income stream requires minimal extra labor - you're already managing cattle, now you're monetizing their waste. For typical farming families earning ₹25,000-40,000 monthly from agriculture, Saubhagya adds ₹12,000-18,000 in supplementary income - a 30-50% boost. This extra income helps families afford better education for children, improved healthcare, agricultural investments, and emergency savings without taking loans.

environmental.title: Environmental & Community Benefits
environmental.subtitle: पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव
environmental.description: Reduce emissions by 40% while improving community health
environmental.details: By properly processing cattle dung through anaerobic digestion, you prevent uncontrolled methane release - a greenhouse gas 25 times more potent than CO₂. Each ton of dung you supply prevents approximately 25kg of methane emissions, equivalent to taking 1.5 cars off roads for a year. This also eliminates groundwater contamination, reduces fly and mosquito breeding, and improves village sanitation. The CBG produced replaces fossil fuels, supporting India's renewable energy targets. The digestate byproduct returned to you is nutrient-rich organic fertilizer, reducing chemical fertilizer costs by 20-30% while improving soil health for better crop yields.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive payment?
faqs.answer: Payments are processed within 24 hours of material verification and directly transferred to your registered bank account.

faqs.question: What is the minimum quantity for pickup?
faqs.answer: We collect minimum 50kg of cattle dung. For smaller quantities, you can accumulate and request pickup when ready.

faqs.question: How do you ensure fair weighing?
faqs.answer: We use IoT-enabled digital weighing scales with real-time data recording. You receive SMS confirmation of weights immediately.

faqs.question: What are the quality requirements?
faqs.answer: Fresh cattle dung with minimal contamination. Our team will guide you on proper storage and preparation methods.

faqs.question: Is there any registration fee?
faqs.answer: No registration fees. Joining Saubhagya is completely free for farmers. We only earn when you earn.

items.question: What is the Saubhagya scheme?
items.answer: The Saubhagya scheme is a government initiative aimed at providing electricity connections to all households in rural and urban areas. It focuses on ensuring universal access to electricity and improving the quality of life for citizens.

items.question: How can I apply for a new electricity connection?
items.answer: You can apply for a new electricity connection through our online portal, mobile app, or by visiting the nearest electricity board office. You will need to provide necessary documents like identity proof, address proof, and property documents.

items.question: What documents are required for connection?
items.answer: Required documents include: Aadhaar card or valid ID proof, address proof (utility bill, rent agreement), property ownership documents, passport-size photographs, and filled application form.

items.question: How long does it take to get a new connection?
items.answer: Typically, a new electricity connection is provided within 7-15 working days after submission of complete documents and payment of required fees. The timeline may vary based on technical feasibility and location.

items.question: What are the charges for a new connection?
items.answer: Connection charges vary based on the type of connection (residential/commercial), load requirement, and location. Detailed tariff information is available on our website or you can contact customer service for specific quotes.

items.question: How can I pay my electricity bill?
items.answer: You can pay your electricity bill through multiple channels: online payment portal, mobile app, bank branches, authorized collection centers, or through digital payment platforms like UPI, net banking, and credit/debit cards.

items.question: What should I do if there is a power outage?
items.answer: In case of power outage, first check if it's a local issue by contacting neighbors. If it's a widespread outage, report it through our helpline number, mobile app, or online portal. Our technical team will address the issue promptly.

items.question: How can I register a complaint?
items.answer: You can register complaints through our 24/7 helpline, online complaint portal, mobile app, or by visiting the nearest customer service center. Each complaint is assigned a unique reference number for tracking.

items.question: Is there any subsidy available under Saubhagya?
items.answer: Yes, eligible households can receive subsidies for electricity connections under the Saubhagya scheme. The subsidy amount and eligibility criteria are determined based on government guidelines and household income levels.

items.question: How can I track my application status?
items.answer: You can track your application status using the reference number provided at the time of application. Check the status through our website, mobile app, or by calling customer service with your application reference number.
